text: Mark Jeffrey Rosker is an physicist at the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) in Arlington, Virginia. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his work on microwave and millimeter-wave phased arrays, gallium nitride semiconductors, and terahertz electronics. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:21st-century American engineers Category:Semiconductor physicists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mark Jeffrey Rosker
